parameters.subject: Approval Needed: Your Scheduled Social Media Content

nodes.name: Send message and wait for response

parameters.sendTo: ={{ $('Form to be filled on execution by Team').item.json.Email }}
parameters.subject: Workflow Continuation Failure
parameters.message:
=Hi Media Team,

An Error Occured while automating the process. This is due to:
  1. Private Drive Link
  2. Image link not provided


Regards,

Admin Team (n8n)

parameters.subject: Incorrect Google Drive Media Link Credentials
parameters.message:
=Dear Media Team,

We attempted to process the Google Drive media link you provided, but it appears that the credentials are incorrect. As a result, the link cannot be executed successfully.

Kindly review the link and ensure that the correct access permissions or credentials are enabled, then refill the form.

Thank you.

Best regards,

Admin Team (n8n)

parameters.sendTo: ={{ $('Form to be filled on execution by Team').item.json.Email }}
parameters.subject: Incorrect Google Drive Media Link Credentials
parameters.message:

We attempted to process the Google Drive media link you provided, but it appears that the credentials are incorrect. As a result, the link cannot be executed.

Kindly review the link and ensure that the correct access permissions or credentials are enabled, then refill the form.

Thank you.

Best regards,

Admin Team (n8n)

parameters.sendTo: ={{ $('Form to be filled on execution by Team').item.json.Email }}
parameters.subject: Post Upload Failed on Instagram
parameters.message:
=Hello Admin,

The Automation failed to post on Instagram.

Post Details:
Title: {{ $('Data after Admin Validation').item.json['Post Title'] }}
Platform: Instagram
Result: Failed

Please try again or contact the admin for further assistance.

Regards,
Admin Team (n8n)

=Hi Media Team,

Regards,

Admin Team (n8n)

Admin Team (n8n)

parameters.subject: Post Uploaded Successfully on Instagram

=Hello Admin,

The Automation has successfully posted on Instagram.

Post Details:
Title: {{ $('Data after Admin Validation').item.json['Post Title'] }}
Platform: Instagram
Result: Success

Please wait one minute if the post is not visible on the platform. In case of long wait time, check your internet connection or connect the Admin for further assistance.

Regards,
Admin Team (n8n)
